amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Village situated in more than one county; tax; how certified.
amendatorysection.para: Taxes levied for village purposes, in villages situated in two or more counties, shall be certified to the county clerk of each county in which any part of such village is situated, and said county clerks shall place the same on the proper tax list.

annotation.para: A tax levy in a village situated in two or more counties shall be certified to the county clerks. Village of Wakefield v. Utecht, 90 Neb. 252, 133 N.W. 240 (1911).
